function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of COVID-19 preparedness and response plans","Impact":"Increased transmission of COVID-19 in various workplaces, leading to business disruption and potential health risks","Mitigation":"Develop and implement comprehensive preparedness and response plans, provide guidance for high-risk individuals, and enforce preventive measures","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and workplace flexibilities","People":"Workers, individuals at high risk, labor and health agencies","Owner":"Labor and health agencies"},{"Description":"Failure to identify and isolate infected persons promptly","Impact":"Spread of infection within the workplace, leading to higher risk of transmission and potential outbreak","Mitigation":"Establish protocols for immediate identification and isolation of infected individuals, provide training, and use health monitoring systems","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and training resources","People":"Employers, workers, and health agencies","Owner":"Employers, health agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate adherence to basic preventive measures","Impact":"Elevated risk of transmission within the workplace, leading to potential outbreaks and increased health risks","Mitigation":"Enforce strict personnel hygienic measures, provide education and training for workers, and implement workplace flexibilities","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, training resources, and workplace management tools","People":"Workers, employers, and workplace management","Owner":"Employers, workplace management"}]}
